entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
